amendment.description: Amendment deletes language which would have exempted public school construction and repair projects from the Davis-Bacon prevailing wage requirements.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to delete the provisions of the bill which would exempt public school construction contractors from the Davis-Bacon prevailing wage requirements.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sabo amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 234 - 188 (Roll no. 511).
